items.text: bouncer, on target, he ducks under it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: fluently punched, coming on the front foot to this fullish one outside off. There's a deep point so the ball doesn't go to the boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: stays in his crease to steer this full ball outside off to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: smashed. Another good bouncer, Hope almost looked like he was going to duck but it was a bit quicker, and he goes for the pull. Connects well eventually to send it over square leg. in fact that came off the back of his bat, but it still travelled quickly
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, SIX runs

items.text: another short ball, rising up sharply from outside off and coming in to home onto the batsman. Gets his gloves up above the chest to keep it down
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run
Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short on middle, comes on quite slowly, aerially pushed towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length on off, hint of turn back in, rocks back and pushes it to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: full on off, comes forward and defends back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length outside off,square drives it with his back leg fully bent
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, opens the face and guides it to backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run

items.text: full on off, comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run

items.text: slower ball outside off, slashed away along the ground to deep point for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, clipped to deep squareleg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, misses the flick but the ball takes the thigh pad and trickles away to the keeper's left which allows an easy single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, 1 leg bye

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: length, angling in, clips it to midwicket's right but can't beat the man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle, extra bounce and Hope has to take his bottom hand off the handle as he defends it to control it
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, slashes but gets a thick outside edge, along the ground to third-man for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chase, 1 run
